title: FS: T206 Demmitt minor print freak - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Demmitt minor print freak - SOLD
posts.post_content: Looks like the brown pass was offset on this one; the hat, belt and the name/team designation skew up and left.  Asking $70 delivered OBO... paypal preferred.
